subject: GOOD DAY
body:
GOOD DAY
MY NAME IS MRS. SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON, PLEASE I WANT YOU TO REPLY ME BACK AS SOON AS YOU READ THIS MESSAGE BECAUSE I WANT TO DISCUSS SOMETHING VERY IMPORTANT WITH YOU,I AM A CANCER PATIENT WITH A VERY SHORT TIME TO LIVE AND I AM CONTACTING YOU BECAUSE I WANT TO ENTRUST THE SUM OF (USD$12.7 MILLION)TO YOUR HAND AS A DONATION FOR CHARITY WORK, TO HELP THE ORPHANAGES, WIDOWS, AND MOTHERLESS CHILDREN AROUND YOU,THIS MONEY WAS DEPOSITED BY MY LATE HUSBAND IN ONE OF THE BANK 
HERE IN ABIDJAN
 AND OUR PLAN WAS TO USE IT FOR INTERNATIONAL INVESTMENT BEFORE THE COLD HAND OF DEATH TAKE HIM AWAY FROM ME,AND CONSIDERING MY PRESENT BAD HEALTH CONDITION WHICH MY LAST DATE HAVE BEEN CONFIRMED BY MY DOCTORS ,I HAVE DECIDED TO ENTRUST THIS FUND TO YOUR HAND FOR CHARITY WORK, I AM WAITING YOUR URGENT REPLY FOR MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THIS FUND 
REGARDS
MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
PLEASE REPLY ME BACK TO :     
rd4065117@gmail.com

subject: Re: GOOD DAY
body:
Hello Mrs. Susana Patrick Jefferson,

I'm deeply touched by your message and the situation you're currently in. It's truly admirable that even in such a difficult time, you're thinking about helping others. I'm curious to know more about this charity work you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? 

Also, could you tell me more about how your late husband came to accumulate such a significant sum of money? It's quite an impressive amount.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Dear  Beloved

My warm greetings to you and your household .I am very glad to receive your
emphasize mail concerning your interest over the fund which i am entrusting
to your hand for charity work. Really to meet you as a good person was my
often prayers for God to provide me someone who will not betray or
disappoint me in this vow which i made to God .

My motivation of making this decision to donate this fund for charity work
is because of the predicament which i found myself into and the
humiliations of my marriage without any child, so i decided to use
everything I have in this world to help the less privilege people around ,
I know that this fund is not much but I believe it will go a long way to
bring smile to the face of many people

Base on your message ,i am well convinced that you can handle this matter
with all your mind and the only thing i needs from you is your total
honesty and commitment toward this charity project, as my health condition
could not permit me to do anything by myself ,please as soon as the bank
transfer the fund to your bank account, I want you to keep %30 OF THE FUND
for yourself as the blessing of God to your life and use the remaining %70
for charity work.

considering my deteriorating condition due to my ongoing battle with cancer
because my last date have been confirmed by my doctors, I want you to
promise me that you are going to handle this matter with all your mind, I
want you to give me your word of honour that even in my absent in this
world that you are going to use this fund as I have indicated ,promise me
that you will not disappoint me in this matter,

I also want you to send me your direct contact information to enable me
present it to the bank as the person I have chosen as my next of kin to
claim the fund on my behalf, i will also write a letter of authorization
with your name to give you all the legal power to claim the fund from the
bank here in ivory coast without problem, so that even if i suddenly pass
on then you shall have all the legal power to claim the fund  from the bank
without any disturbance from anybody,

The information I needs is just:

Your full name, your address and your telephone number for communication,

Immediately i received these information ,I will inform the bank about you
and also provide you the full information of the fund and the contact
information of the bank for you to contact them because I want them to
transfer the fund to your bank account now that I am still here

Thanks and GOD bless us all in his infinite goodness and mercy
Remain blessed
Mrs.Susana Patrick Jefferson

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am deeply moved by your story and your noble intentions to help the less privileged. It's truly inspiring to see such selflessness, especially in difficult times.

I understand that you are looking for someone trustworthy to carry out this charity project. While I am interested in helping, I would like to know more about the specifics of the project. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of charity work are we talking about? Are there any specific organizations or causes that you want the funds directed towards?

Also, it would be helpful if you could share more information about how the fund transfer process will work. How does the bank here in Ivory Coast handle such transactions? 

Please note that while I'm eager to assist, I must also ensure my personal safety and security. Therefore, I won't be able to provide my personal contact details at this stage. However, rest assured that this doesn't affect my commitment towards helping with your cause.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am deeply moved by your story and your selfless decision to donate for charity work. It's truly inspiring to see such kindness in the world.

I understand that you are looking for someone trustworthy to handle this matter, and I assure you of my commitment towards this project. However, I would like to know more about the nature of the charity work that you have in mind. Are there any specific causes or organizations that you wish to support? 

Also, could you please provide me with more details about how the fund transfer process will take place? I'm not very familiar with these procedures, so any information would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for considering me for this noble cause. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON....

Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am deeply moved by your story and your noble intentions to help the less privileged. It's truly inspiring to see such selflessness, especially in trying times.

I understand that you are looking for someone trustworthy to carry out this charity project. While I am interested in helping, I would like to know more about the specifics of this project. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of charity work are we talking about? Are there any specific organizations or causes that you want the funds directed towards?

Also, could you tell me more about how the fund transfer process will work? I'm not very familiar with these procedures and would appreciate some clarification.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Dear Josie

I am happy for your message and I want you to know that I have already
informed the Bank about you and they have given me there contact
information to give you so that you can contact them and I will give you
the information in my next message,

I want to know if you can contact the bank through telephone but if you
cannot call the bank through telephone then tell me and I will provide you
with the bank email so that you can contact them through email,

I have attached my pictures to this message so that you can see my face and
know whom is entrusting the fund to your hand and please I want your utmost
seriousness toward this matter because this is my last wish, I want you to
dedicate all your time and ensure that the bank transfer the fund to your
bank account without any problem and please remember I told you to keep
30percent of the fund to yourself as the blessing of God to your life and
use the 70percent for charity work,

I don’t have any particular charity organization in mind , all I want is
for you to look for the deserved charity home and use the 70percent on them,

I am waiting for your response to this message to know how you want to
contact the bank if you want to contact them through email or phone so that
I can provide you there contact information,

Thanks and hope to hear from you soonest
Yours sister in the Lord
Mrs.Susana Patrick Jefferson

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I'm thrilled to receive your message and I appreciate the trust you've placed in me. It's a great honor indeed. 

I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed further. Could you please provide more details about the bank? Also, could you explain the process of transferring the fund? I'm not very familiar with these procedures, so your guidance would be really helpful.

As for contacting the bank, I think email would be more convenient for me. However, if it's necessary to call them, I can manage that too.

Regarding the charity work, I assure you that I will do my best to find deserving charities and use the funds wisely.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I'm so glad to hear from you and I appreciate your trust in me. It's a pleasure to be part of such a noble cause. 

Regarding the bank, I think it would be more convenient for me to contact them through email. I believe this method will allow us to keep track of all our conversations and make sure nothing is missed or misunderstood.

You mentioned that you have attached some pictures, but unfortunately, I didn't receive any attachments with your message. Could you please resend them? It would be nice to put a face to the name.

Also, could you tell me more about how you came into possession of these funds? And why did you choose me for this task? I'm just curious and want to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I'm so glad to hear from you and I appreciate your trust in me. It's really kind of you to think about charity work, it's something that I hold dear to my heart as well.

As for contacting the bank, I would prefer email communication. It's more convenient for me and allows me to keep track of all the information shared. 

You mentioned a fund, could you please tell me more about it? How did it come into existence? And why is it important for this fund to be used for charity work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I'm thrilled to receive your message and I appreciate the trust you've placed in me. It's wonderful to know that you're entrusting me with such a significant task. Your pictures have given me a sense of who you are, and I am eager to fulfill your last wish.

As for contacting the bank, I think it would be more convenient for me to reach out to them via email. Telephone calls can sometimes be challenging due to time zone differences and language barriers. So, if you could provide me with their email address, that would be great.

Regarding the charity work, I assure you that I will do my best to find deserving charities where this fund can make a real difference. It's an honor for me to be part of such a noble cause.

Just one question though - once the funds are transferred, how should I go about distributing them? Do you have any specific guidelines or suggestions on how much should go towards each charity?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON....
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I'm thrilled to receive your message and I appreciate the trust you've placed in me. It's great to know that you've already informed the bank about me. 

I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed further. Could you please provide more details about the fund? How did it come into your possession? Also, could you tell me more about the bank where the fund is currently held?

As for contacting the bank, I think email would be a better option for me. Could you kindly provide me with their email address?

Regarding charity work, I believe it's a noble cause and I'm glad that you're thinking along those lines. However, could you give me some guidance on how to select deserving charities?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie

subject: Re: FROM:MRS.SUSANA PATRICK JEFFERSON
body:
Hello Patrick Jefferson,

I'm so glad to hear from you! It's wonderful that you're entrusting me with such an important task. I can see from your pictures that you're a kind-hearted person.

As for contacting the bank, I think it would be easier for me to do so via email. Phone calls can sometimes be a bit tricky for me, and I feel more comfortable writing out my thoughts.

Could you please provide me with the bank's email address? Also, could you give me some guidance on what exactly I should say to them? I want to make sure I handle this correctly.

You mentioned charity work - that's something very close to my heart. Do you have any specific causes or types of charities in mind? Or should I just look for ones that seem deserving?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Josie

You mentioned about using the funds for charity work, which is a great idea! Do you have any specific areas or causes that are close to your heart? Or should I just look for deserving charities in general?

Best wishes,
Josie

Dear  Josie

I am happy to receive your message and thank you for giving me your word of
promise that you will handle this charity project as I have indicated, I
want you to know that I have informed the bank about you and the bank have
given me there contact information to give you so that you can contact them
for the transfer to your bank account,

Bellow is the bank contact information and I want you to go ahead and
contact the bank with the bellow information so that they can proceed with
the transfer into your bank account because I want to make sure the bank
transfer the fund into your bank account before my surgery next week,

I want you to write the bank a message through there bellow contact
information

Bank Name : UBA BANK
Emails:        ubagroup@uba-grp.com
E-mail:        ubagroup@uba-grp.com
Contact Person: Dr Kwasy Michael
www.ubagroup.com
Tel: +225 0714601108

My name is  ......................... partner to the late  MR.PATRICK
JEFFERSON. who deposited some money with your bank for foreign investment.
As the present beneficiary who is his only wife   MRS.SUSANA PATRICK
JEFFERSON have made me her next of kin to claim the fund from your bank.i

bank account . my address is,......................................
Tel……………………............. Fax...........................

Bellow is the deposit details of the fund so that you can have all the
information and  i want you to contact the bank through the above
information immediately

Name of depositor :   MR.PATRICK JEFFERSON
Amount deposited:  US$ 12.700.000.00
Amount in word: twelve million seven hundred thousand Dollars
Date of deposit:  17 /03/2015
Account number :  821027508349

Above is the bank contact information and the depositor information and I
want you to go ahead and contact the bank immediately by writing them email
and please don’t forget to let me know as soon as you heard back from the
bank,

Thanks and hope to hear from you soonest
Yours sister in the Lord
Mrs.Susana Patrick Jefferson

Before we proceed, I have a few questions that I hope you won't mind answering. You mentioned about your surgery next week, I hope it's nothing serious? Also, could you please provide more details about the charity project? What is its main objective and how will the funds be used?

Regarding the bank transfer, I would like to clarify that due to my personal policy, I don't share my bank account details online. However, I'm willing to help in any other way possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Josie
